resources:
Service Discovery open close
Q1: What is this app used for? Q2: How many public services can I choose? Q3: What is a "Mission"? Q4: How can I add a mission? Q5: Why should I fill the questions?
A: This app is designed for guiding refugees to discover and learn about the public services they can access for free.
A: There are four categories of services available: Library, Education, Park, Museum. All the free services in these four categories are shown in this app.
A: The mission in our app is used to encourage users to go to the public services. The mission represents if the users have finished visiting one service. >
A: Users can click the “View” button at the home page and add new missions.
A: We need to know some information about you like your status, interest and preferences so that we can recommend the most suitable services to you :)
